good_examples.name: AI Consulting - Louisville Restaurant
good_examples.subject: Cut Your Restaurant's Review Analysis Time by 10 Hours/Week
good_examples.body:
Hi Sarah,

I noticed Proof on Main has over 500 Google reviews - that's fantastic! But I imagine analyzing all that feedback to find actionable insights takes your team hours each week.

I've built an AI tool specifically for Louisville restaurants that analyzes all your reviews in seconds and gives you:
• Key themes customers mention most
• Actionable recommendations to improve satisfaction
• Real-time sentiment tracking

Would you be interested in a free 15-minute demo next Tuesday or Thursday? I'll analyze Proof on Main's reviews live and show you exactly what customers are saying.

No sales pressure - just showing a local tool that could save you 10+ hours per week.

Best,
Matthew Scott
Louisville AI Consultant
PS: You can try it yourself right now at demos.projectlavos.com

good_examples.name: SaaS Product Launch
good_examples.subject: Your team asked for this feature - it's finally here
good_examples.body:
Hey Michael,

Remember when your team said they needed automated report scheduling? We listened.

Starting today, you can:
✓ Schedule any report to run daily, weekly, or monthly
✓ Auto-send to unlimited team members
✓ Export in PDF, Excel, or CSV formats

This feature is live in your account right now. Here's a 2-minute video showing how to set it up: [link]

Quick stat: Beta users saved an average of 6 hours/week on reporting.

Want me to walk your team through it? I have 15-minute slots open tomorrow at 2pm or 3pm EST.

Let me know!
Alex Chen
Customer Success Manager

P.S. This feature is included in your current plan - no additional cost.

bad_examples.name: Generic Spam
bad_examples.subject: Revolutionary AI Solution for Your Business!!!
bad_examples.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Greetings!

We are excited to introduce our cutting-edge, revolutionary, game-changing AI platform that will transform your business overnight! Our solution uses advanced machine learning algorithms and neural networks to optimize your workflows and increase productivity by 500%!!!

Our comprehensive suite of tools includes:
- Artificial Intelligence
- Machine Learning
- Deep Learning
- Natural Language Processing
- Computer Vision
- Blockchain Integration
- Quantum Computing
- And much more!

We guarantee results or your money back! Act now and receive 50% off our already low prices! This offer expires soon!

Our award-winning platform has been featured in numerous publications and is trusted by Fortune 500 companies worldwide.

Click here to schedule a demo: [suspicious link]

Don't miss this opportunity to revolutionize your business!

Best Regards,
John Smith
Senior Sales Executive
AI Solutions Inc.

P.S. Forward this email to 10 colleagues and receive an additional discount!

bad_examples.name: Unfocused Pitch
bad_examples.subject: Hi
bad_examples.body:
Hello,

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out to you today because I wanted to tell you about what we do. We are a company that does many things and we think you might be interested.

We have been in business for a while and have some clients. Our services could maybe help your business in various ways. We do consulting and also software and sometimes training. It really depends on what you need.

If you want to learn more, you can maybe give us a call or send an email back. We're pretty flexible with our pricing and can probably work something out.

Anyway, let me know if you want to chat sometime. Or not, that's fine too.

Thanks for your time and consideration of this matter.

Regards,
Bob
